yapanaya disapathi karyayedi pasugiya da (14) pawathi niwasa, nawatha padinch kirime ha sanwardhana katayuthu soya balima ha pragathi samalochanayata ekwemin agamathiwaraya mema upades niladharinta laba dunneya. 2002 wasaredi da thama agamathiwaraya lesa me pilibanda soya bala niladharinta upades laba dunnada ema aanduwa bida watima nisa kriyathmaka wi nomathi bawa sihipath kala agamathiwaraya mema idam kadinamin janathawata nidahas karana lesada kiya sitiyeya.
